title: ProductSystem

version.description: A version number in MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH format where the MINOR and PATCH fields are optional and the fields may have leading zeros (so 01.00.00 is the same as 1.0.0 or 1).

lastChange.description: The timestamp when the entity was changed the last time.

tags.description: A list of optional tags. A tag is just a string which should not contain commas (and other special characters).

library.description: If this entity is part of a library, this field contains the identifier of that library. The identifier is typically just the combination of the library name and version.

processes.description: The descriptors of all processes and sub-systems that are contained in the product system.

referenceProcess.description: The descriptor of the process that provides the flow of the functional unit of the product system.

referenceExchange.description: The exchange of the reference processes (typically the product output) that provides the flow of the functional unit of the product system.

targetAmount.description: The flow amount of the functional unit of the product system.

targetUnit.description: The unit in which the flow amount of the functional unit is given.

targetFlowProperty.description: The flow property in which the flow amount of the functional unit is given.

processLinks.description: The process links of the product system.

parameterSets.description: A list of possible sets of parameter redefinitions for this product system.

description: A product system describes the supply chain of a product (the functional unit) ...
